message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. It's a unique opportunity to own a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $750,000. This is a great deal, considering the product's true value is $800,000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
